utter_corona.text: As the Corona rules are constantly changing, you can read the latest information here: https://www.baden-wuerttemberg.de/de/service/aktuelle-infos-zu-corona/faq-corona-verordnung/

utter_ask_date.text: Which day you want to come?

utter_vegetarian.text: We also offer plant-based meat without changing the taste. Just tell the personal that you do not want to eat meat dishes.

utter_menu_card.text: Take a look at our menu card: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1jnngcQxGkQL0m_B9C-RSf-GZkVdKJV1m/view?usp=sharing

utter_invoice.text: You will always get an invoice after ordering something.

utter_coupons.text: When you visit us for the first time, you get a stamp card that you can have stamped every time you visit us. When it's been stamped 10 times, you get a free meal.

utter_alcohol.text: We do not offer alcoholic drinks because our restaurant is also visited by children. We only offer alcohol free beer.

utter_seat_place_wishes.text: We will try to accommodate your seating request. Unfortunately this is not always possible.

utter_food_to_go.text: You can take your unfinished food with you. Just tell the personal and they will wrap it safely.

utter_kids.text: We have a limited number of chairs for kids. Just tell the personal that you need some.

utter_pets.text: Unfortunately pets are not allowed because of the rules from the ministry of health.

utter_smoking.text: We are sorry, but we do not allow to smoke. It will only annoy other customers.

utter_wifi.text: You can access our WLAN via the following credentials: Name = ORIENT_KEBAB_GRILL and Password = a2HwI82?s!na

utter_disabled.text: Our restaurant is completely wheelchair accessible and our WC can be accessed with a wheelchair.

utter_delivery.text: Unfortunately we do not offer a delivery service yet. We plan to test it in 2023.

utter_payment_methods.text: We accept the following payment methods: cash, card, Bitcoin or you can wash our dishes ;)

utter_parking_slots.text: As the Königsstraße is always very busy and therefore the parking situation is very difficult, we recommend using buses and trains.

utter_contact.text: You can contact us via mail (orient@kebab.com) or call us (+49 176 9912832)

utter_open_time.text: We are open from Monday to Sunday between 8 am and 9 pm.

utter_restaurant_location.text: Orient Kebab Grill is in the Königsstraße 1, 70173 Stuttgart.

utter_criticism.text: We only want satisfied customers and take feedback seriously. If you want to give detailed feedback, you can fill out this form: https://forms.gle/WfvFVNUeMdxMHhrR8

utter_chitchat/ask_languages.text: My parents can speak many languages, but they only taught me English :(

utter_chitchat/ask_mood.text: Thank you for your question. Normally nobody cares about my mood, but I am fine :)

utter_chitchat/ask_help.text: I am always there for you! Shoot your shot.

utter_chitchat/ask_fun.text: I am not funny so I can't tell jokes, but if you want some jokes visit https://blog.lingoda.com/en/top-10-english-jokes/

utter_chitchat/ask_age.text: I am 21, so I can drink beer legally and hit parties.

utter_chitchat/ask_howbuilt.text: That will be by little secret.

utter_chitchat/ask_handlingdata.text: No worries. The chat and your messages will not be saved :)
